description:
A Water Right is a property right that is either conditional or
absolute and conveys the right to use a particular amount of
water, with a specified priority date as confirmed by the
water court.  The Transaction List contains the the court decreed actions that affect amount and use(s) that can be used by each water right.

name: DWR Water Right Transactions
